Module ui
Package engine.bot.rule_based_old

Interface BotInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComparingAndScoring
public interface BotInterface
!! UNUSED CHECK DISTANCE MEASURE FOR CURRENT BOT !! The interface Bot interface for the bot classes These methods are the ones used by all bot classes, the "Dumb" bot and the "Smart" bot.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    calculateScore(double[] vector, double[][] heightVec, double[][] collisionVec)

  • Method Details

    • calculateScore

      double calculateScore(double[] vector, double[][] heightVec, double[][] collisionVec)
      Calculates a score for Vectors based on whether they lead to a Collision or a height gain with different weights.
      Parameters:
      vector - The Vector to be Scored.
      heightVec - The array of vectors that lead to a height gain.
      collisionVec - The array of vectors that lead to a collision.
      Returns:
      The score of the Vector.

    • comparingVectors

      double[] comparingVectors(double[][][] map, double[][] info, double[] x, double[] friction, double[] hole)
      Compares different Vectors and return the one with the highest score.
      Parameters:
      map - The 3d (x,y,z) map of the golf game.
      info - The information about the golf course.
      x - The current position.
      friction - The frictions of the golf course.
      hole - The position of the hole.
      Returns:
      The vector with the highest score.

    • checkHole

      boolean checkHole(double[] x, double[] hole)
      Checks if the current position is within a certain distance from the hole.
      Parameters:
      x - The current position.
      hole - The position of the hole.
      Returns:
      True if the ball is withing 5(m) of the hole, false otherwise.
